A credit card is required on this offer. Your subscription will automatically renew each month and you will be charged at the then-current Student {{offerName}} rate during the initial {{offerTerm}}-month period. Please see our Customer Agreement for complete terms and how to cancel, which includes calling us at 1-888-539-7474. To qualify for the Student {{offerName}} subscription plan, you must be at least 18 years of age and currently enrolled in a Canada-based, degree granting, accredited school of higher education (an “Eligible Student”). Student {{offerName}} requires eligibility verification and annual re-verification in order to maintain the Student {{offerName}} rate. Your eligibility will be verified upon initial enrollment and then every {{offerTerm}} months thereafter to continue receiving the student rate. If you fail re-verification, either because you are no longer an Eligible Student or fail to re-verify your enrollment status at the end of any {{offerTerm}}-month period, you will no longer be eligible for the Student {{offerName}} rate and your subscription will automatically renew thereafter every month at the then-current full-priced monthly rate for {{offerName}} (currently {{retailRate}}/month, plus fees and taxes). This offer is only available online and cannot be combined with any other offer and cannot be transferred or sold. Eligible Students who currently have an active {{offerName}} subscription may contact us at the phone number above for instructions on how to change their subscription to a Student {{offerName}} plan.

We utilize SheerID Inc. (“SheerID”), a third-party verification service to verify your student eligibility which includes collecting and processing your name, educational institution, email address, and date of birth. In some cases, SheerID may request additional documentation to establish your enrollment, such as a school-issued ID, class schedule, transcript, registration, or tuition receipt. You are providing your information for verification to SheerID which will be subject to the terms of SheerID’s Privacy Policy available at www.sheerid.com/privacy-policy/ and such information may be shared and used by SiriusXM in accordance with its Privacy Policy. You acknowledge and agree that SiriusXM and SheerID may process, share and use your information consistent with the terms of each party’s respective Privacy Policies.

SiriusXM reserves the right, consistent with our Customer Agreement, to change the rate charged for the Student {{offerName}} subscription plan, limit the duration of Student Eligibility, or to modify, suspend or cease offering this plan at any time in its sole discretion. In the event SiriusXM ceases to offer the Student {{offerName}} subscription plan, SiriusXM is under no obligation to permit any further subscriptions to this plan. Further SiriusXM may terminate or suspend your access to the Student {{offerName}} subscription any time including for any actual or suspected unauthorized use of the service or SiriusXM may in its sole discretion request re-verification of a student’s eligibility at any time if it suspects any individual to be acting in violation of these Offer Details. STUDENT_RTP_OFFER_STREAMING: OFFER DETAILS: Eligible Students (defined below) who subscribe to the Student {{offerName}} plan will receive the first {{offerTerm}} {{pluralMonthsMap}} at no charge. A credit card is required for this offer. You must cancel during the first {{offerTerm}} {{pluralMonthsMap}} to avoid being charged. Your subscription will automatically renew every month thereafter at the then-current Student {{offerName}} rate (currently {{followOnPrice}}/month, plus fees and taxes). Please see our Customer Agreement for complete terms and how to cancel, which includes calling us at 1-888-539-7474. To qualify for the Student {{offerName}} subscription plan, you must be at least 18 years of age and currently enrolled in a Canada-based, degree granting, accredited school of higher education (an “Eligible Student”). Student {{offerName}} requires eligibility verification and annual re-verification in order to maintain the Student {{offerName}} rate. Your eligibility will be verified upon initial enrollment and then every {{followOnTermLength}} months thereafter to continue receiving the student rate. If you fail re-verification, either because you are no longer an Eligible Student or fail to re-verify your enrollment status at the end of any {{followOnTermLength}}-month period, you will no longer be eligible for the Student {{offerName}} rate and your subscription will automatically renew thereafter every month at the then-current full-priced monthly rate for {{offerName}} (currently {{retailRate}}/month, plus fees and taxes). A Music Royalty and Administrative Fee (MRF) of 10.2% applies. All fees, content and features are subject to change. This offer is only available online and cannot be combined with any other offer and cannot be transferred or sold. Eligible Students who currently have an active {{offerName}} subscription may contact us at the phone number above for instructions on how to change their subscription to a Student {{offerName}} plan.

We utilize SheerID Inc. (“SheerID”), a third-party verification service to verify your student eligibility which includes collecting and processing your name, educational institution, email address, and date of birth. In some cases, SheerID may request additional documentation to establish your enrollment, such as a school-issued ID, class schedule, transcript, registration, or tuition receipt. You are providing your information for verification to SheerID which will be subject to the terms of SheerID’s Privacy Policy available at www.sheerid.com/privacy-policy/ and such information may be shared and used by SiriusXM in accordance with its Privacy Policy. You acknowledge and agree that SiriusXM and SheerID may process, share and use your information consistent with the terms of each party’s respective Privacy Policies.

These Student {{offerName}} Offer Details incorporate the terms of our Customer Agreement by reference, supplement them, and control in the event of a conflict between these Student {{offerName}} Offer Details and the Customer Agreement as it relates to this student subscription. SiriusXM reserves the right, consistent with our Customer Agreement, to change the rate charged for the Student {{offerName}} subscription plan, limit the duration of Student Eligibility, or to modify, suspend or cease offering this plan at any time in its sole discretion. In the event SiriusXM ceases to offer the Student {{offerName}} subscription plan, SiriusXM is under no obligation to permit any further subscriptions to this plan. Further SiriusXM may terminate or suspend your access to the Student {{offerName}} subscription any time including for any actual or suspected unauthorized use of the service or SiriusXM may in its sole discretion request re-verification of a student’s eligibility at any time if it suspects any individual to be acting in violation of these Offer Details. If SiriusXM suspends your subscription access, you agree that SiriusXM will have no liability to or responsibility to you. SiriusXM’s failure to enforce any terms of this program will not constitute a waiver of that provision. Offer not available to residents of Quebec.

RTD_OFFER_STREAMING: OFFER DETAILS: Your SiriusXM service will automatically stop at the end of the stated trial subscription term unless you decide to subscribe. If you decide to subscribe, the paid subscription plan you choose will begin at the end of your trial subscription term and service will automatically continue thereafter and you will be charged according to your chosen payment method at the then current rates of your selected package (currently {{retailRate}} per month) for as long as you choose to remain a subscriber. Fees and taxes apply, including a Music Royalty and Administrative Fee of 10.2%. You may cancel at any time by calling us at 1-888-539-7474. By registering for a trial subscription, you agree that SiriusXM may contact you with the registration information provided with special offers from time to time. You may always change your contact preferences with us. All terms, fees, content and features are subject to change. This offer cannot be combined with any other and may be modified or terminated at any time. This offer is available to eligible new subscribers or subscription activations based on package. Channel lineup varies by package. The service may not be available unless “data” is enabled; data charges may apply. Contact your wireless service provider for details. You can only listen on one streaming device at a time per subscription. Subscriptions to SiriusXM Canada are subject to our Customer Agreement. We collect and use personal information according to our Privacy Policy.
